articles.title: Coachella and Stagecoach festivals canceled over concerns about coronavirus spread - CNN
articles.description: The annual Coachella and Stagecoach festivals -- two of the largest music events held in Southern California -- have been canceled over concerns about coronavirus spread, local health officials announced Wednesday.
